members.name: getPicture
members.description: Take a picture or video, or load one from the library.

params.name: options
params.description: Options that you want to pass to the camera. Encoding type, quality, etc. Platform-specific quirks are described in the [Cordova plugin docs](https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-camera#cameraoptions-errata-).

members.name: cleanup
members.description: Remove intermediate image files that are kept in temporary storage after calling camera.getPicture.Applies only when the value of Camera.sourceType equals Camera.PictureSourceType.CAMERA and the Camera.destinationType equals Camera.DestinationType.FILE_URI.
